rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A minimalistic Scandinavian entrance with natural light through large windows and a neutral color palette.

rooms.name: Living Room & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan living area fused with the kitchen, featuring Scandinavian design elements such as clean lines, natural wood finishes, and ample natural light. Built-in storage solutions for a clutter-free environment.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet corner with built-in shelves, ambient lighting, and large windows to enhance natural illumination and ventilation. Vastu principles are adhered by positioning the library in a north-eastern location to promote knowledge.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact yet functional bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation. Positioned on the south-western side aligning with Vastu principles for tranquility. Scandinavian-inspired decor includes neutral colors and minimalistic furniture.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large glass doors to ensure natural light flows into the living area. Reinforced design for security while maintaining Scandinavian aesthetics.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Multiple windows throughout the ground floor to enhance ventilation and daylight penetration, following natural orientation guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A small balcony adjoining the living area leading to the rooftop terrace. Provides an outdoor extension and ensures ample ventilation.
